column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Azula says : " Chan , I 'm ready for a tour of the house . "
#Text=Chan says : " Is this your first time on Ember Island ? "
#Text=Azula says : " No .
#Text=Yeah , it 's like , welcome to Sandy Land !
#Text=" Azula says : " Your arms look so strong .
#Text=" Chan says : " Yeah , I know .
#Text=You 're pretty .
#Text=" Azula says : " Together , you and I will be the strongest couple in the entire world !
#Text=We will dominate the Earth !
#Text=" Chan says : " Uh ... I got to go .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Hey , watch it !
#Text=That food was for my cranky girlfriend !
#Text=" Ruon - Jian says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Stop talking to my girlfriend !
#Text=" Ruon - Jian says : " Relax .
#Text=It 's just a party .
#Text=" Mai says : " Zuko , what is wrong with you ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " What 's wrong with me ?
#Text=" Mai says : " Your temper is out of control .
#Text=You blow up over every little thing .
#Text=You 're so impatient and hotheaded and angry !
#Text=" Zuko says : " Well , at least I feel something , as opposed to you .
#Text=You have no passion for anything !
#Text=You 're just a big blah !
#Text=" Mai says : " It 's over , Zuko .
#Text=We 're done .
#Text=" Chan says : " Who broke my nana 's vase ?
#Text=That 's it !
#Text=You 're out of here !
#Text=" Zuko says : " I was just leaving .
#Text=" Ruon - Jian says : " Have fun by yourself , loser boy .
#Text=" Chan says : " Nice .
#Text="
